descriptionlist.description: Tweak to help you downgrade your A7 device to iOS 10.3.3. Install this, reboot and go to the software update settings to install 10.3.3. VERY EXPIREMENTAL. MIGHT BOOTLOOP YOU. I don't take responsibility for what this could do to your device. ONLY INSTALL THIS ON AN A7 DEVICE IF YOU INTEND TO DOWNGRADE!! Contact Smacpats if you have issues, or for a version of electra without version checks, if you mess up and want to stay on 11.3.1.
